caption.title: Distribution of total patent applications in the world, 2004/2015.
caption.p: The top 4 country patent offices are indicated. Source: WIPO Statistics (World 2004: 1.574.200 patent applications; World 2015: 2.888.800 patent applications). Available in: https://www3.wipo.int/ipstats/keysearch.htm?keyId=221. Access in: August 18, 2017.
